source.f16debe8:
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd
np.set_printoptions(threshold=np.inf)

df = pd.read_csv('../input/novel-corona-virus-2019-dataset/covid_19_data.csv',header=0)
df = (df[df['Country/Region']=='Australia'])
df = df.groupby('ObservationDate').sum()
print(df)
source.81eae88d:
df['daily_confirmed'] = df['Confirmed'].diff()
df['daily_deaths'] = df['Deaths'].diff()
df['daily_recovery'] = df['Recovered'].diff()
df['daily_confirmed'].plot()
df['daily_recovery'].plot()
plt.show()
source.b21e8c28:
from plotly.offline import iplot
import plotly.graph_objs as go

daily_confirmed_object = go.Scatter(x=df.index,y=df['daily_confirmed'].values,name='Daily confirmed')
daily_deaths_object = go.Scatter(x=df.index,y=df['daily_deaths'].values,name='Daily deaths')

layout_object = go.Layout(title='Aus daily cases 20M51783',xaxis=dict(title='Date'),yaxis=dict(title='Number of peoole'))
fig = go.Figure(data=[daily_confirmed_object,daily_deaths_object],layout=layout_object)
iplot(fig)
fig.write_html('Aus_daily_cases_20M51783.html')
source.d97d0a8c:
df1 = df#[['daily_confirmed']]
df1 = df1.fillna(0.)
styled_object = df1.style.background_gradient(cmap='gist_ncar').highlight_max('daily_confirmed').set_caption('Daily Summaries')
display(styled_object)
f = open('table_20M51783.html','w')
f.write(styled_object.render())
source.c237a31b:
On 3/28 the most people were infected. 
After that, in a short period of time, the number of infected people decreased while alternating between increase and decrease.
At present, it can be said that the situation has almost converged.
source.48a14cab: Note: June10,2020 shows the total cases since initial data.
source.84df8f5a: New South Wales is 267th. It is the highest in Australia.
source.fb16b8c5:
In　Austlaria,
**On March 15,** the Australian government launched the first national cabinet in Australia's history (a federation of federal and state ministers and regional ministers) to deal with the spread of the new coronavirus.
Federal Governor declared a biosecurity emergency for a person.
The federal government and each state/regional government work together, such as restrictions on entry of foreign travelers, strict self-isolation measures, restrictions on gatherings, restrictions on domestic travel, restrictions on places related to social gatherings such as restaurants. We are implementing various measures.

At a press conference after the National Cabinet Meeting on Friday,**** May 8****, Prime Minister Morrison set three restrictions on the past measures toward the goal of achieving a safe economy against the new coronavirus in July. We announced the "Roadmap for Australia Safe against New Coronaviruses" that will be alleviated in Japan.
With regard to this restriction relaxation measure, the governments of each state and territory will decide concrete measures in consideration of the situation in each region. 

I think that the government of Australia took the situation seriously,and succeeded in controlling the situation.
